item.name: Select
item.hint: Select an efficient/appropriate operation, method, or strategy for solving problems where there is aknown procedure, algorithm, or method of solution.

item.name: Represent
item.hint: Display mathematical information and data in diagrams, tables, charts, or graphs, and generate equivalent representations for a given mathematical entity or relationship.

item.name: Model
item.hint: Generate an appropriate model, such as an equation, geometric figure, or diagram for solving a routine problem.

item.name: Implement
item.hint: Implement a set of mathematical instructions (e.g., draw shapes and diagrams to given specifications).

item.name: Solve Routine Problems
item.hint: Solve standard problems similar to those encountered in class. The problems can be in familiar contexts or purely mathematical.
